About essuanlive

Expert in data analysis with excellent understanding of processing data, using techniques, virtual tools such as Azure, Tableau, r-studio for visualization. Strictly focused with analytical approach using numerical simulations to predict features of a data (Machine Learning). Comprehensive knowledge in GIS techniques. Using spatial data to project risk in flood prone areas. Safely setup a local and online communication using communication exchanges (PABx)and remote connections with Internet protocols.
